name: Seth Meyers

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: What does this mean, Presidents can now just take whatever they want from the White House? When Joe Biden leaves, he should jump in the cockpit and fly away with Air Force One. He already has the aviators.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Trump’s defense team got the one judge in the country who agrees with them. It’s like when LeBron James got the one ref who didn’t think this was traveling. [Clip of James taking about six unhurried steps without dribbling] Usually when you travel that far you get your passport stamped.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: They don’t belong to Trump, they belong to us. In fact, if Trump gets to keep them, then we should all get to take a turn with them. Next time I’m stuck on a stalled F train, I want to be able to pull out a dossier full of nuclear secrets. Plus, it beats doing Wordle.

name: Stephen Colbert

name: Stephen Colbert

name: Stephen Colbert

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: [After the RNC urged speakers to tone down their speeches without changing them] “‘Hi. name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: I gotta say, for what was supposed to be a boring rematch, things have been crazy. It feels like if you fall asleep for a second, you will miss some insane twist in this election. Fortunately, this election has made it impossible to fall asleep ever again.

name: Jimmy Fallon
